briefTitle: Maximizing Benefit of Lung Cancer Screening Incidental Findings of Cardiovascular, Respiratory and Breast Measures
officialTitle: Maximizing Benefit of Lung Cancer Screening Incidental Findings of Cardiovascular, Respiratory and Breast Measures
conditions: Coronary Disease, Emphysema or COPD, Breast Density
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Precaution Adoption Process Model (PAPM) health behavior stage
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Eligible for lung cancer screening program
* Presence of one of three incidental findings on low dose CT: coronary artery calcification, extensive breast density (for females), or emphysema

Exclusion Criteria:

* No incidental findings from lung cancer screening low dose CT
